name: WebSocket
description: Send and receive text messages to a WebSocket server.

conditions.name: On opened
conditions.description: Triggered when the connection to the WebSocket server is successfully established.

conditions.name: On closed
conditions.description: Triggered when an active connection is closed.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered when there is a connection error.

conditions.name: Is open
conditions.description: True if the connection is currently open.

conditions.name: Is connecting
conditions.description: True if the connection is currently being established.

conditions.name: Is supported
conditions.description: True if the user's client supports WebSocket connections.

conditions.name: On binary message
conditions.description: Triggered when a message is received from the server in binary format.

params.name: Receive to
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object to write the received binary message to.

conditions.name: On text message
conditions.description: Triggered when a message is received from the server in text format.

params.name: URL
params.description: Enter the WebSocket server to connect to.

params.name: Protocol (optional)
params.description: Enter a required sub-protocol the server must support in order to establish a connection.  Leave empty for no protocol requirement.

actions.name: Send text
actions.description: Send a text string to the server.

params.name: Data
params.description: A text string to send to the server.

actions.name: Send binary
actions.description: Send the contents of a Binary Data object to the server.

params.name: Binary data
params.description: A Binary Data object to send as a message.

expressions.name: CloseReason
expressions.description: The reason for closing in 'On closed'.

expressions.name: MessageText
expressions.description: The text content of the message in 'On message'.
